org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 ReversedStoreScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.NonLazyKeyValueScanner
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.NonReversedNonLazyKeyValueScanner
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.StoreScanner
          • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.ReversedStoreScanner
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ChangedReadersObserver, InternalScanner, KeyValueScanner, Shipper
    直接已知子类:
    ReversedMobStoreScanner

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ReversedStoreScanner
extends StoreScanner
implements KeyValueScanner
    ReversedStoreScanner extends from StoreScanner, and is used to support reversed scanning.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.StoreScanner

        DEFAULT_HBASE_CELLS_SCANNED_PER_HEARTBEAT_CHECK, HBASE_CELLS_SCANNED_PER_HEARTBEAT_CHECK, heap, readPt, store, STORESCANNER_PARALLEL_SEEK_ENABLE, STORESCANNER_PREAD_MAX_BYTES

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.KeyValueScanner

        NO_NEXT_INDEXED_KEY

    • 构造器概要

      构造器

      Opens a scanner across memstore, snapshot, and all StoreFiles.
      ReversedStoreScanner(Scan scan, ScanInfo scanInfo, NavigableSet<byte[]> columns, List<? extends KeyValueScanner> scanners)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean backwardSeek(Cell key)
      Seek the scanner at or before the row of specified Cell, it firstly tries to seek the scanner at or after the specified Cell, return if peek KeyValue of scanner has the same row with specified Cell, otherwise seek the scanner at the first Cell of the row which is the previous row of specified KeyValue
      protected void checkScanOrder(Cell prevKV, Cell kv, CellComparator comparator)
      Check whether scan as expected order
      boolean reseek(Cell kv)
      Reseek the scanner at or after the specified KeyValue.
      protected void resetKVHeap(List<? extends KeyValueScanner> scanners, CellComparator comparator) 
      boolean seek(Cell key)
      Seek the scanner at or after the specified KeyValue.
      protected boolean seekAsDirection(Cell kv)
      Do a backwardSeek in a reversed StoreScanner(scan backward)
      protected void seekScanners(List<? extends KeyValueScanner> scanners, Cell seekKey, boolean isLazy, boolean isParallelSeek)
      Seek the specified scanners with the given key
      protected boolean seekToNextRow(Cell kv) 
      boolean seekToPreviousRow(Cell key)
      Seek the scanner at the first Cell of the row which is the previous row of specified key

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ReversedStoreScanner

        public ReversedStoreScanner(HStore store,
                            ScanInfo scanInfo,
                            Scan scan,
                            NavigableSet<byte[]> columns,
                            long readPt)
                     throws IOException
        Opens a scanner across memstore, snapshot, and all StoreFiles. Assumes we are not in a compaction.
        参数:
        store - who we scan
        scanInfo -
        scan - the spec
        columns - which columns we are scanning
        抛出:
        IOException

      • ReversedStoreScanner

                            ScanInfo scanInfo,
                            NavigableSet<byte[]> columns,
                            List<? extends KeyValueScanner> scanners)
                     throws IOException
        Constructor for testing.
        抛出:
        IOException

        protected boolean seekAsDirection(Cell kv)
                           throws IOException
        Do a backwardSeek in a reversed StoreScanner(scan backward)
        覆盖:
        seekAsDirection 在类中 StoreScanner
        返回:
        true if scanner has values left, false if end of scanner
        抛出:
        IOException

      • reseek

        public boolean reseek(Cell kv)
               throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueScanner
        Reseek the scanner at or after the specified KeyValue. This method is guaranteed to seek at or after the required key only if the key comes after the current position of the scanner. Should not be used to seek to a key which may come before the current position.
        指定者:
        reseek 在接口中 KeyValueScanner
        覆盖:
        reseek 在类中 StoreScanner
        参数:
        kv - seek value (should be non-null)
        返回:
        true if scanner has values left, false if end of scanner
        抛出:
        IOException

      • seek

        public boolean seek(Cell key)
             throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueScanner
        Seek the scanner at or after the specified KeyValue.
        指定者:
        seek 在接口中 KeyValueScanner
        覆盖:
        seek 在类中 StoreScanner
        参数:
        key - seek value
        返回:
        true if scanner has values left, false if end of scanner
        抛出:
        IOException

      • seekToPreviousRow

        public boolean seekToPreviousRow(Cell key)
                          throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueScanner
        Seek the scanner at the first Cell of the row which is the previous row of specified key
        指定者:
        seekToPreviousRow 在接口中 KeyValueScanner
        覆盖:
        seekToPreviousRow 在类中 NonReversedNonLazyKeyValueScanner
        参数:
        key - seek value
        返回:
        true if the scanner at the first valid Cell of previous row, false if not existing such Cell
        抛出:
        IOException

      • backwardSeek

        public boolean backwardSeek(Cell key)
                     throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueScanner
        Seek the scanner at or before the row of specified Cell, it firstly tries to seek the scanner at or after the specified Cell, return if peek KeyValue of scanner has the same row with specified Cell, otherwise seek the scanner at the first Cell of the row which is the previous row of specified KeyValue
        指定者:
        backwardSeek 在接口中 KeyValueScanner
        覆盖:
        backwardSeek 在类中 NonReversedNonLazyKeyValueScanner
        参数:
        key - seek KeyValue
        返回:
        true if the scanner is at the valid KeyValue, false if such KeyValue does not exist
        抛出:
        IOException
